HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.description: IRresistible is a specialized app designed specifically for people managing insulin resistance. We understand the unique challenges you face and provide the tools you need to make healthy eating simple and sustainable.
HomePage.keywords: inzulinrezisztencia, étrend, egészséges étel, receptek, bevásárlólista, diéta, cukorbetegség, egészséges életmód, főoldal

AppInfo.title: What is IRresistible App?
AppInfo.description: IRresistible is a specialized app designed specifically for people managing insulin resistance. We understand the unique challenges you face and provide the tools you need to make healthy eating simple and sustainable.
AppInfo.healthyRecipesDescription: Discover a curated collection of delicious, insulin-friendly recipes that help maintain stable blood sugar levels.
AppInfo.mealPlanningDescription: Create personalized meal plans that fit your lifestyle and dietary needs, making healthy eating effortless.
AppInfo.shoppingListsDescription: Generate organized shopping lists based on your meal plans, helping you stay on track with your health goals.

NewsletterSignup.title: Be the First to Know
NewsletterSignup.description: IRresistible is coming soon! Subscribe to our newsletter to get notified when the app launches and receive exclusive early access offers.
NewsletterSignup.successMessage: Thank you for subscribing! We'll keep you updated about our launch.
NewsletterSignup.privacyMessage: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
NewsletterSignup.subscribeButtonSuccess: Thank you for subscribing! We'll keep you updated about our launch.

Hero.heroTitle: Healthy recipes for insulin resistant people
Hero.heroDescription: Customized diet plans and simple recipes for everyday life

InsulinResistanceInfo.insulinResistanceDescription: Insulin resistance is a condition where your body's cells don't respond properly to insulin, a hormone that helps regulate blood sugar levels. This can lead to higher blood sugar levels and eventually type 2 diabetes if not managed properly.
InsulinResistanceInfo.howOurAppCanHelpDescription: Our app provides personalized tools and guidance to help you manage insulin resistance through:
InsulinResistanceInfo.howOurAppCanHelpCustomizedMealPlanning: Customized meal planning based on your needs
InsulinResistanceInfo.disclaimer: *The information provided is for educational purposes only and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice.

Footer.description: Your personal companion for managing insulin resistance through healthy eating and lifestyle choices.
